response.overview: A man told Alison to sit down and now she's doing a whole stand up show about it. Appeared on House of Games, Celebrity Goggle Box and Pointless Celebrities. Podcast appearances on Off menu, The Gargle and Trusty Hogs. Co-host of Magazine Party, Wheel of Misfortune and Guilty Feminist. Tour Support for Fern Brady, Rob Delaney and Maria Bamford. British Comedy Guide best reviewed show of the Fringe 2022.
response.title: Alison Spittle: BIG
